source_sentence: Importantly, KalGold's methods resulted in the definition of a JORC resource estimate (3.61 Mt @ 1.19 g/t Au for 138,000 ozÂ¹) that is one of the most inexpensive in recent times (A$4.60 per ounce of gold).
